page.title: 13Games we play in Barton
page.content:
In the playground we play different games at different times of the year. Skipping and hopscotch are always popular as are various ball games.
One ball game is called "Freeze". In this game children form a circle, standind with their feet apart. The ball is bounced in the centre of the circle and allowed to roll. The person between whose feet it rolls is "on". The others scatter. As soon as the one who is "on" picks up the ball he/she shouts "Freeze". THe others stand still and he/she throws the ball attempting to hit one of the others. If he/she misses, all scatter. Anyone who is hit is also "on". The game continues until everyone is "on" or until the bell rings for the end of playtime.
